mapper.insert:
insert into unicom_alarm_lte
node_name,
mo,
alarm_time,
alarm_name_id,
alarm_level_id,
cell_name,
#{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmNameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmLevelId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{cellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId, cell_name cellName FROM unicom_alarm_lte;

SELECT a.node_name nodeName, a.mo, a.alarm_time alarmTime, a.alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, a.alarm_name_id alarmNameId, a.cell_name cellName FROM unicom_alarm_lte a INNER JOIN unicom_protect_lte b on a.node_name = b.node_name

SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId, cell_name cellName FROM unicom_alarm_lte WHERE node_name NOT IN (SELECT node_name FROM unicom_protect_lte)

SELECT a.node_name nodeName, a.cell_name cellName, a.alarm_time alarmTime, a.alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, a.alarm_name_id alarmNameId, a.mo FROM unicom_alarm_lte a LEFT JOIN unicom_node_lte b ON a.node_name = b.node_name WHERE b.group_name = #{groupName}
SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId, cell_name cellName FROM unicom_alarm_lte WHERE node_name = #{nodeName}
SELECT node_name nodeName, mo, alarm_time alarmTime, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_name_id alarmNameId, cell_name cellName FROM unicom_alarm_lte WHERE cell_name = #{cellName}
